headline: A Once-in-a-Decade Opportunity: 1 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stock Down 36% to Double Up on Right Now
summary: A perfect example of this combination today is animal healthcare specialist Zoetis (NYSE: ZTS).  Whether helping our furry friends at home, keeping livestock healthy, or doing its part to battle the bird flu outbreak that has sent egg prices sky high, Zoetis is easy to root for these days.  Here are the five main reasons that have me doubling up on my position in this magnificent S&P 500 dividend stock.
